top_hiking_trails_in_sweden.name: The King’s Trail (Kungsleden)
top_hiking_trails_in_sweden.description: One of the most beautiful hiking trails in Sweden and the world, spanning over 400 km through forests, mountains, rivers, and alpine landscapes. It offers varying difficulty levels and is popular during the summer when daylight lasts nearly 24 hours.
top_hiking_trails_in_sweden.accommodation: Overnight huts every 10-20 km with manned huts during the summer season.

top_hiking_trails_in_sweden.name: Kebnekaise
top_hiking_trails_in_sweden.description: Sweden's highest mountain, standing at 2,097 meters. The hike is 18 km round trip with two routes: Östra leden (eastern) and Västra leden (western), offering varied landscapes including glaciers and Sami settlements.
top_hiking_trails_in_sweden.accommodation: STF Kebnekaise Mountain Station and mountain cabins.

top_hiking_trails_in_sweden.name: St. Olavsleden Pilgrim Trail
top_hiking_trails_in_sweden.description: A historic pilgrimage trail stretching nearly 600 km from Sweden to Norway, following the footsteps of King Olav Haraldsson. It offers cultural insights and stunning natural scenery, passing through forests, mountains, and lakes.
highlights: Pilgrim route from Selånger (Sweden) to Trondheim (Norway)
top_hiking_trails_in_sweden.accommodation: Hotels, huts, and campsites along the way.

top_hiking_trails_in_sweden.name: Sörmlandsleden
top_hiking_trails_in_sweden.description: A popular trail offering over 1,000 km of diverse landscapes, including forests, lakes, and coastline. The trail is divided into sections ranging from easy to challenging.

top_hiking_trails_in_sweden.name: The Emigrant Trail (Utvandrarleden)
top_hiking_trails_in_sweden.description: A 110 km trail through Småland, where many Swedes emigrated to the United States. The route offers a historical journey with charming villages and literary connections to Vilhelm Moberg's novels.
highlights: Historical villages like Ljuder, Långasjö, and Duvemåla

top_hiking_trails_in_sweden.name: Skåneleden
top_hiking_trails_in_sweden.description: A 1,600 km trail through the beautiful region of Skåne. The trail passes through both rocky coastlines and old forests, offering both natural beauty and cultural experiences.
